basic.blooming: Succulent plants, flowers sometimes in spring and autumn with white flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, in summer with high temperature shade properly under strong light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, moderately resistant to drought
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem timely to avoid waste of nutrition
